resources.string: Mark all items as non bought?
Please create a new shopping list
Please add a new unit or a group
HandyPro uses standard user interface elements, such as swipes, regular and long taps, and a sliding menu. But additional functions have some special features. Open the help menu to learn more.
swipe to move next or previous page
The first step is to create a new shopping list.
Then add either a product or a group.
To finish adding the item simply tap done button on your keyboard. Adding units does not automatically cancel the creation process. You can create many items in a sequence.
To exit from the creation screen just tap on empty space.
Tapping on an item will mark it as bought.
It will automatically move to the bottom of the list and change it\'s color to green. If you tap again, it will become unbought.
To add items into a group, click the plus button.
You can delete items from the list by swiping it either left or right. This can be undone for several seconds after deletion.
Additional buttons are here to delete, cancel or buy all items in a single tap.
Drag and sort items manually by taping long on them. You can change a theme and other preferences in the settings.
Geofence has been successfully added. %1$d\\%2$d geofences available
All geofences have been successfully removed.
Channel for Handy geofence and time-based notifications.
Tap on the notifications to open the list
Network Error. Please check your Internet connection and try again.
The map module needs permissions to access to the Internet and your location to work properly.
The app needs permissions to work with the map
It seems that you denied permissions. Please grant permissions manually from the phone settings to be able to use geofence notifications.
A secret code from this user was changed. Ask for a new one.
Secret code must be 7 character long
Secret code must contain only numbers and latin characters
Network error while updating contact list
Error while signing in. Check your Internet connection
Your account has been disconnected from the app
The secret code is copied to clipboard!
You have received a shopping list!
Sender: %1$s. Tap to open the list.
Generating a new secret code has failed
Your account has been successfully deleted
The secret code is not correct. Check the spelling and try again.
No lists were delivered. The user is not logged in the app.
Sending has failed. The user has changed the secret code. Ask him for a new one.
The name can not be blank
The user with this name already exists
The code must be 7 characters long
The code must contain only numbers and latin characters
You will have to send a new code to your contacts to be able to receive shopping lists from them
You can\'t change the secret code more than once per minute
\"%1$s\" contact is going to be deleted. Are you sure? (this cannot be undone)
Unable to register more than 100 geofences
Error while adding the geofence. Check if gps is enabled on your device.
My secret code is: %1$s If you don\'t have HandyPro application yet, you can download it in Google Play: %2$s
Authentication required. You can sign in the menu (coming from the left side of the screen)
Channel for received shopping lists notifications
Press the bell icon to set notifications for this list up.
There are two types of notifications available: time-based notifications and geofence notifications.
Time-based ones are similar to alarms. You set the time and turn the switch on.

Geofences are special zones on a map. When the geofence is crossed, notification fires telling you to go shopping. To create the geofence, tap long on the map. To remove, tap on the geofence once. Slider on the side is for setting the geofence radius.

The maximum of geofences is 100. Accuracy and consistency of geofencing events depend on the device\'s opportunity to calculate your coordinates correctly. It is possible to increase accuracy by turning wi-fi, mobile network, and GPS on.

If geofencing events do not trigger or trigger not accurate enough, try to increase the geofence radius. Geofencing events depend on how often and how accurate coordinates are calculated in different phone working modes. Only the android system defines coordinate update frequency and accuracy when the device is in the idle state. Thus upgrading the Android OS version also may help.
If the geofence function is not reliable for you, please use time-based notifications. Geofencing is available only for registered users (that will be discussed on the next page).

Registration and signing in is required for adding geofences and sending shopping lists to other users. To sign in, pull the menu out from the left side of the screen and push the corresponding button. To revoke application access from your account, tap long on the logout button. If you make a fast tap on the logout button, you will sign out from the app and will stop receiving shopping lists from other users on this device.

After signing in is complete, you will have access to contacts and sending lists function. Also, a new field in the settings will appear. There you can find the secret code, buttons to control the secret code, and the button to delete your account.

Secret code is your identifier for other users. Share it with another user, and he will be able to send you his shopping lists. If you ever change the secret code, you will have to send it to your contacts again. This system is designed to prevent spam and jokes from other users.

To add a new contact, tap on the Contacts menu item. Then tap on the corresponding button, enter the name and the secret code which you got from another user. If the secret code is correct, the contact will be added. In another case, you will receive an error.
To send the list to another person, tap on the Share button.

In the share menu, you can select a person who will receive your shopping list. Also, there is a convenient button to add new contacts (just like in the contacts menu). You can enter additional information in the commentary field (500 characters maximum).

After pushing the send button, your list will be sent. If the recipient has changed his secret code, you will receive an error, and the list will not be delivered. If the recipient has signed out from the app on all of his devices, the list will not be delivered too.
If you see a pale contact with a strikethrough secret code in it, it means that a person has changed his secret code. The only available option is to remove this contact.
Premium subscription is available in the app.

Ads are not showed when you have a premium subscription. Also, the maximum of available geofences goes from 1 to 100. If you plan using premium-subscription mainly for geofencing, consider testing the geofencing feature on your device first. Because there are a lot of factors (like wi-fi availability, phone model, weather conditions, and others) that influence geofence accuracy, geofencing can or can not be a reliable source of notifications and requires preliminary testing.
Going premium is your best opportunity to thank the creator for making the app. It was developed and is maintained by a single independent developer, who will be grateful for your support :)
Join me in HandyPro – simple and functional shopping list! Download from Google Play: %1$s
The geofence count is limited to 1 for the free version. Would you like to buy the premium subscription? (the limit will go up to 100 geofences)
Search works only within the visible map area. If you want to expand the area, zoom out. For searching again, tap the magnifier button on the virtual keyboard.
Take advantage of a premium subscription! Get rid of annoying ads and raise the geofence limit to 100.
An unknown billing exception occurred. Billing service is unavailable.
ERROR. Please check your Internet connection.
You can cancel the subscription in Google play subscription settings.
An error occurred. Try again or contact the developer. Error code: %1$d
This subscription will be automatically renewed at the end of the subscription period. You can cancel the subscription in the Google play settings.
This subscription will NOT be automatically renewed (you cancelled the subscription). You can restore auto renewal in the Google play setting.

HandyPro uses some anonymous data from your device to provide the necessary functionality and for the app improvement. The full list of collected data is available in the Privacy Policy (the link is clickable).
Clicking on the “Begin” button means that you accept the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use of the app. The Privacy Policy and Terms of Use are available at any time in the “About” menu section.

HandyPro Privacy policy.

HandyPro Terms of Use.

This app uses Yandex.Maps.
Terms of Use for Yandex.Maps Service.
Give it to another user to be able to receive lists from him
This will delete only the friend list and other metadata from the cloud
